He follows all the buddha lands into the samādhi of wisdom.
Because of this samādhi power.

Following the buddha-lands, they enter the samādhi of wisdom and joy.
They make offerings to all the buddhas in their lands.

source_sentence: 隨諸佛國入清淨樂三昧。
